duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead design teams through full product development of hardware and into production.
Consult on mechanical architectures, assess technical requirements and competencies needed during quoting and oversee design progressions during product developments.
Interface with / understanding client applications, instrument interfaces.
Raise perception of our company acumen in the industry by authoring or presenting papers, articles, etc.
Work with Site Directors to define potential R&D project proposals that will help increase areas of competencies needed.
Manage product design and documentation at a system level.
Perform independent research and engineering studies.
Effectively consult on multiple projects in parallel.
May perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
